text: In one of the bedrooms, you notice a black mark on the wall, as if something had been against it. You mark the location of the mark with an appropriate description, photo, and clue number. What should be done with it next?
option2: You determine that someone simply painted the wall and the mark is not relevant.
option3: You write in the protocol that there may have been a painting here because the victim was a painter.
option4: You walk away and do nothing.
